sentences.english: If you have not broken samaya, you will become Buddha eventually.
sentences.chinese: 你若未破三昧耶，你终将成佛。

sentences.english: Maitreya Bodhisattva is also entitled Compassionate man, because he always cultivates compassionate mind and obtain this samadhi.
sentences.chinese: 弥勒又称为慈氏，因其常修慈心，而得此三昧故。

sentences.english: They are powers in the worldly state, but they are obstacles to Samadhi.
sentences.chinese: 在世俗状态下他们是力量，但对于三昧它们是障碍。

sentences.english: But the knowledge which is gained from Samadhi is of a much higher order.
sentences.chinese: 但从三昧中获得的知识更高级。

sentences.english: This achievement of sameness or identity with the object of concentration is known as samadhi.
sentences.chinese: 这种与专注对象的同一被称为三昧。

sentences.english: Ultimately, this may result in the state of Samadhi or oneness with the Divine Self.
sentences.chinese: 最终，这会导向一种三昧的状态或者说与神合一。

sentences.english: In reaching nirvichara samadhi the mind becomes pure.
sentences.chinese: 在无伺三昧中，心会变的纯粹。

sentences.english: This achievement of sameness or identity with the object of concentration is known as Samadhi.
sentences.chinese: 这种与专注对象的同一被称作三昧。

sentences.english: But even these are not direct aids to the seedless Samadhi.
sentences.chinese: 但即使是这三支对无种三昧也没有直接帮助。

sentences.english: It is futile to receive empowerments if you do not keep the samayas.
sentences.chinese: 若不持守三昧耶，受灌顶也徒劳。

sentences.english: The impression which is made upon the mind by that Samadhi wipes out all other past impression.
sentences.chinese: 由三昧加于人心的印迹将抹去过去所有其他印迹。

sentences.english: This is the ultimate method of samadhi and the most esoteric Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 这是根本的三昧法，最究竟的密法。

definition: to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
World Honored One/Revered One of the World (Buddha)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
arhat (Sanskrit)/a holy man who has left behind all earthly desires and concerns and attained nirvana (Buddhism)
Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
